trans-unit.source: Here, both selectors have the same specificity, so if the mouse hovers over the button while it is enabled, the second rule takes precedence. If we want the text to be white in that case, we can reorder the rules like this:
trans-unit.target: 在这里,两个选择器具有相同的特异性,所以如果在启用按钮时鼠标悬停在按钮上,则第二条规则优先。如果在这种情况下,我们希望文本是白色的,我们可以像这样重新排列规则。

trans-unit.source: Here, modifying buttonText directly modifies the textItem.text value; it does not change some other value that then updates textItem.text. If buttonText was not an alias, changing its value would not actually change the displayed text at all, as property bindings are not bi-directional: the buttonText value would have changed if textItem.text was changed, but not the other way around.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，修改 buttonText 直接修改textItem.text值；它不会更改其他值，然后更新textItem.text。如果 buttonText 不是别名，则更改其值实际上根本不会更改显示的文本，因为属性绑定不是双向的：如果更改了textItem.text，则 buttonText 的值将发生更改，但反之则没有。

trans-unit.source: Here, the Item object is able to access and set the values of Keys.enabled and Keys.onReturnPressed. This allows the Item object to access these extra attributes as an extension to its own existing attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，Item对象能够访问和设置 Keys.enabled 和 Keys.onReturnPressed 的值。这允许Item对象访问这些额外的属性，作为对其自身现有属性的扩展。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset for the rendered shadow compared to the DropShadow item position. Often, the DropShadow item is anchored so that it fills the source element. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered exactly under the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.
trans-unit.target: Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义渲染的阴影与DropShadow项位置相比的偏移量。通常，DropShadow项是锚定的，以便它填充源元素。在这种情况下，如果将Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性设置为0，则阴影将恰好在源项目下呈现。通过更改偏移属性，可以相对于源项放置阴影。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset for the rendered shadow compared to the InnerShadow item position. Often, the InnerShadow item is anchored so that it fills the source element. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered fully inside the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.
trans-unit.target: Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义了与InnerShadow项位置相比，渲染阴影的偏移量。通常，InnerShadow项是锚定的，以便它填充源元素。在这种情况下，如果将Horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性设置为0，则阴影将完全呈现在源项目内部。通过更改偏移属性，可以相对于源项放置阴影。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset for the rendered shadow compared to the DropShadow item position. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered exactly under the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.

Often, the InnerShadow item is anchored so that it fills the source element. In this case, if the HorizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties are set to 0, the shadow is rendered fully inside the source item. By changing the offset properties, the shadow can be positioned relatively to the source item.

trans-unit.source: Host Nodes use custom URLs to simplify connections. Currently, QtRO supports two types of connections:
trans-unit.target: 主机节点使用自定义URL来简化连接。目前,QtRO支持两种类型的连接。

trans-unit.source: Host Nodes use custom URLs to simplify connections. While the list will likely be extended, QtRO currently supports two types of connections. A "tcp" connection (using the standard tcp/ip protocol) supports connections between devices as well as between processes on the same device. A "local" connection (which can have less overhead, depending on the underlying OS features) only supports connections between processes on the same device.
trans-unit.target: 主机节点使用自定义URL来简化连接。虽然这个列表可能会被扩展,但QtRO目前支持两种类型的连接,一种是 "tcp "连接(使用标准的tcp/ip协议),支持设备之间以及同一设备上的进程之间的连接。一个 "tcp "连接(使用标准的tcp/ip协议)支持设备之间以及同一设备上的进程之间的连接。本地 "连接(根据底层操作系统的特性,它的开销可能较小)只支持同一设备上的进程之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Hover events are delivered when there is no current mouse grabber item. They are sent when the mouse cursor enters an item, when it moves around inside the item, and when the cursor leaves an item. Hover events are commonly used to highlight an item when it's entered, and for tracking the mouse cursor as it hovers over the item (equivalent to QWidget::mouseTracking).
trans-unit.target: 没有当前的鼠标采集器项目时，将传递悬停事件。当鼠标光标进入一个项目时，它们在该项目内部移动时以及当光标离开一个项目时，将发送它们。悬停事件通常用于在输入项目时突出显示该项目，并在其悬停在项目上时跟踪鼠标光标（等效于QWidget :: mouseTracking）。

trans-unit.source: Hover events are only provided if acceptHoverEvents() is true.
trans-unit.target: 仅当acceptHoverEvents（）为true 时才提供悬停事件。

trans-unit.source: How far to offset the image with the brush. Sensible values are in the range [0...3]. The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 用笔刷偏移图像的距离。合理值在 [0...3] 范围内。默认值为 1 。

trans-unit.source: How fast the trail fades. The range is [0...1], with 0 meaning that the object trail persists indefinitely, and 1 meaning that the object trail fades out immediately. The default value is 0.25.
trans-unit.target: 踪迹消失的速度。范围是 [0...1] ，其中 0 表示对象跟踪无限期地持续，而 1 表示对象跟踪立即消失。默认值为 0.25 。

trans-unit.source: How pixels are suppose to be read is determined by the TypeInterpretation enum. It describes if color values are suppose to be read byte per byte, or if a pixel is suppose to be read as a complete int and then masked.
trans-unit.target: 假定如何读取像素由TypeInterpretation枚举确定。它描述了是否假设每个字节读取一个字节的颜色值，或者是否假定一个像素读取为一个完整的int然后被屏蔽。

trans-unit.source: How the color roles are used is up to the style. For instance, if the style uses gradients, one can use a palette color and make it darker or lighter with QColor::darker() and QColor::lighter() to create the gradient. In general, if you need a brush that is not provided by the palette, you should try to derive it from one.
trans-unit.target: 如何使用颜色角色取决于样式。例如，如果样式使用渐变，则可以使用调色板颜色，并使用QColor :: darker（）和QColor :: lighter（）将其变暗或变亮以创建渐变。通常，如果您需要调色板未提供的画笔，则应尝试从中获得。

trans-unit.source: However, note that both the horizontal and vertical dimensions of your image must be POT(power of two) to be stored on the GPU. Most of modern GPUs support NPOT(non-power of two) textures but many investigations show that using NPOT textures hurts about 30% of the performance. If you need to use NPOT textures, we recommend to make the dimensions multiple of 4. It might help your GPU to use its memory and cache efficiently and finally increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 然而,请注意图像的水平和垂直尺寸必须是POT(2的功率)才能存储在GPU上。大多数现代的GPU都支持NPOT(非二倍力)纹理,但许多调查显示,使用NPOT纹理会损害30%的性能。如果您需要使用NPOT纹理,我们建议您将尺寸设置为4的倍数,这样可以帮助您的GPU有效地使用内存和缓存,最终提高性能。

trans-unit.source: However, note that both the horizontal and vertical dimensions of your image must be a multiple of 4 to be stored on the graphics card. If you save an image at 107×29, Qt Quick 3D scales it up asymmetrically to 108×32, before sending it to the graphics card. This smears your image slightly, and also wastes performance while the image is resized.
trans-unit.target: 但是，请注意，图像的水平和垂直尺寸都必须是4的倍数，才能存储在图形卡上。如果将图像保存为 107×29 ，则Qt Quick 3D会将其不对称地放大到 108×32 ，然后再将其发送到图形卡。这会稍微弄脏您的图像，并且在调整图像大小时也会浪费性能。

trans-unit.source: However, on some platforms this is configurable, so that the same operations described above will produce negative delta values (but with the same magnitude). trans-unit.source: However, on some platforms this is configurable, so that the same operations described above will produce negative delta values (but with the same magnitude). In a QML component (such as a tumbler or a slider) where it is appropriate to synchronize the movement or rotation of an item with the direction of the wheel, regardless of the system settings, the wheel event handler can use the inverted property to decide whether to negate the angleDelta or pixelDelta values.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在某些平台上，这是可配置的，因此上述相同操作将产生负增量值（但幅度相同）。在适合于使项目的移动或旋转与滚轮方向同步的QML组件（例如翻转开关或滑块）中，无论系统设置如何，滚轮事件处理程序都可以使用倒置属性来确定否定angleDelta或pixelDelta值。

trans-unit.source: However, on some platforms this is configurable, so that the same operations described above will produce negative delta values (but with the same magnitude). With the inverted property a wheel event consumer can choose to always follow the direction of the wheel, regardless of the system settings, but only for specific widgets. (One such use case could be that the user is rotating the wheel in the same direction as a visual Tumbler rotates. Another usecase is to make a slider handle follow the direction of movement of fingers on a touchpad regardless of system configuration.)
trans-unit.target: 然而,在某些平台上,这是可配置的,因此上述相同的操作将产生负的delta值(但幅度相同)。使用倒置属性,轮子事件消费者可以选择始终遵循轮子的方向,而不管系统设置如何,但只针对特定的部件。一个这样的用例可能是,用户旋转滚轮的方向与视觉Tumbler旋转的方向相同。另一个用例是让滑块手柄跟随手指在触摸板上的移动方向,而不管系统配置如何。)

trans-unit.source: However, since fbdev is being deprecated in the Linux kernel, the DRM dumb buffer support is also available, as of Qt 5.9. To use it, set the QT_QPA_FB_DRM environment variable to a non-zero value. When set, provided that dumb buffers are supported by your system, legacy framebuffer devices like /dev/fb0 won't be accessed. Instead, the rendering is set up via the DRM APIs, similar to the eglfs_kms backend in EGLFS. The output is double-buffered and page flipped, providing proper vsync for software-rendered content as well.
trans-unit.target: 但是，由于在Linux内核中已弃用fbdev，因此从Qt 5.9开始，还提供了DRM哑缓存支持。要使用它，请将 QT_QPA_FB_DRM 环境变量设置为非零值。设置后，只要系统支持哑缓冲区，就不会访问旧的帧缓冲区设备（例如 /dev/fb0 )。相反，渲染是通过DRM API设置的，类似于 eglfs_kms 中的eglfs_kms后端。输出经过双缓冲和页面翻转，也为软件渲染的内容提供了适当的垂直同步。

trans-unit.source: However, some mice have finer-resolution wheels and send delta values that are less than 120 units (less than 15 degrees). To support this possibility, you can either cumulatively add the delta values from events until the value of 120 is reached, then scroll the widget, or you can partially scroll the widget in response to each wheel event.
trans-unit.target: 然而,有些鼠标具有更精细的分辨率轮子,并发送小于120单位(小于15度)的delta值。为了支持这种可能性,您可以将事件中的delta值累加,直到达到120的值,然后滚动小组件,或者您可以响应每个轮子事件部分滚动小组件。

trans-unit.source: However, some mice have finer-resolution wheels and send delta values that are less than 120 units (less than 15 degrees). To support this possibility, you can either cumulatively add the delta values from events until the value of 120 is reached, then scroll the widget, or you can partially scroll the widget in response to each wheel event. But to provide a more native feel, you should prefer pixelDelta() on platforms where it's available.
trans-unit.target: 但是，某些鼠标具有更高分辨率的滚轮，并且发送的增量值小于120个单位（小于15度）。为了支持这种可能性，您可以从事件中累积添加增量值，直到达到120的值，然后滚动小部件，或者可以响应每个转轮事件来部分滚动小部件。但是要提供更自然的感觉，您应该在可用的平台上首选pixelDelta（）。

trans-unit.source: However, the data-driven, declarative nature of the Shape API often means better cacheability for the underlying CPU and GPU resources. A property change in one ShapePath will only lead to reprocessing the affected ShapePath, leaving other parts of the Shape unchanged. Therefore, a frequently changing property can still result in a lower overall system load than with imperative painting approaches (for example, QPainter).
trans-unit.target: 但是，Shape API的数据驱动的声明性性质通常意味着对基础CPU和GPU资源的更好的可缓存性。一个ShapePath中的属性更改只会导致重新处理受影响的ShapePath，而Shape的其他部分保持不变。因此，与命令式绘制方法（例如QPainter）相比，频繁更改的属性仍然可以导致较低的总体系统负载。

trans-unit.source: However, to have interoperability between QHash's keys and STL-style algorithms we need an iterator that dereferences to a key instead of a value. With QHash::key_iterator we can apply an algorithm to a range of keys without having to call QHash::keys(), which is inefficient as it costs one QHash iteration and memory allocation to create a temporary QList.
trans-unit.target: 但是，要使QHash的键和STL样式算法具有互操作性，我们需要一个迭代器，该迭代器取消引用键而不是值。使用QHash :: key_iterator，我们可以将算法应用于一系列键，而不必调用QHash :: keys（），这效率低下，因为它花费了一次QHash迭代和内存分配来创建临时QList。

trans-unit.source: However, to have interoperability between QMap's keys and STL-style algorithms we need an iterator that dereferences to a key instead of a value. trans-unit.source: However, you cannot reimplement Qt-specific event handlers like mousePressEvent or keyPressEvent and expect them to be called reliably. The embedded control covers the QAxWidget completely, and usually handles the user interface itself. Use control-specific APIs (i.e. listen to the signals of the control), or use standard COM techniques like window procedure subclassing.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您不能重新实现Qt特定的事件处理程序（例如mousePressEvent或keyPressEvent），并且不能期望它们被可靠地调用。嵌入式控件完全覆盖了QAxWidget，通常会处理用户界面本身。使用特定于控件的API（即侦听控件的信号），或使用标准COM技术（例如，窗口过程子类化）。
